title: QA Specialist with ABA Healthcare Experience
job_overview:
About BlinkHire

BlinkHire is a recruitment startup on a mission to connect exceptional talent with leading global organizations. We leverage data-driven workflows and smart automation to deliver faster, higher-quality hiring solutions.

Role Overview

We’re looking for a proactive Quality Assurance to help maintain the accuracy, compliance, and quality of our clients’ ABA clinical documentation. You’ll work under the QA Manager to monitor session notes, run AI-powered audits, and support clinical program reviews across platforms like Rethink Behavioral Health, Central Reach, Brellium, and Noteguard AI.

Key Responsibilities

Documentation Monitoring
Review and track session-note submissions in Rethink BH & Central Reach
Flag and follow up on late, missing, or incomplete notes
Ensure corrections meet QA guidelines

AI Audit Support:

Run audits in Brellium & Noteguard AI
Highlight recurring or critical issues (grammar, SOAP format, clinical content)
Summarize findings for the QA Manager

Clinical QA Assistance:

Assist with spot-checks of skill-acquisition and behavior-reduction programs
Track supervision compliance and learning-tree updates
Support new QA initiatives and maintain QA dashboards
Collaboration & Reporting:
Coordinate follow-ups, reminders, and coaching sessions
Help compile weekly/monthly QA reports and metrics

Nice to have: 

1+ year in ABA, behavioral-health, or medical documentation
Hands-on with Rethink BH, Central Reach, Brellium, or Noteguard AI 
Excellent attention to detail and written/verbal English

Core Skills
Clinical Documentation Review – Proven ability to audit and validate ABA session notes.
AI-Powered QA Tools – Experience running and interpreting Brellium or Noteguard AI audits.
Cross-Functional Collaboration – Effective communicator with BCBAs, RBTs, and QA teams.

How to Apply:

Submit your resume, a brief cover note highlighting your ABA QA experience, and any sample checklists or audit summaries you’ve created. 
We look forward to reviewing your application.
